scripts.deploy:local: pnpm prepare:deploy scroll && pnpm codegen && graph deploy metrom-croc-scroll --node http://localhost:8020 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 -l 0.0.1
scripts.deploy:scroll:ambient: pnpm prepare:deploy scroll ambient && pnpm codegen && graph deploy metrom-ambient-scroll -l 0.0.8
scripts.deploy:swell:ambient: pnpm prepare:deploy swellchain ambient && pnpm codegen && graph deploy metrom-ambient-swell -l 0.0.6
